lead_paragraph: ABRAMSON--Richard S. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Mr. Richard S. Abramson. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President, The Harmonie Club 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  ABRAMSON, RICHARD S

snippet: ABRAMSON--Richard S. The Harmonie Club notes with sorrow the passing of our honored member Mr. Richard S. Abramson. We extend our heartfelt condolences to his entire family. Philip R. Cowen, President, The Harmonie Club 1/3
